definition: to extend as long as/to lengthen out to
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: Residents of many major urban areas complain of 20-hour-long daily blackouts.
sentences.chinese: 很多大城市的居民抱怨每天断电时间长达20小时。

sentences.english: Orangutan mothers face up to eight years of single parenthood raising their infants.
sentences.chinese: 猩猩母亲则要做长达八年的独自养育幼儿的单亲家长。

sentences.english: It looks like a 500-foot-long red snake.
sentences.chinese: 它看上去像一条长达500英尺的红蛇。

sentences.english: After that, she is put on the anti-estrogen Tamoxifen for five years.
sentences.chinese: 之后，她服用抗雌激素的三苯氧胺长达五年。
这是一班飞行时间长达11小时的飞机。

sentences.english: It took me as long as three hours to climb the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 我用了长达三个小时的时间才爬上那座山。

sentences.english: The collapse of the Han dynasty was followed by nearly four centuries of rule by warlords.
sentences.chinese: 汉朝灭亡后是长达四个世纪的军阀割据时代。

sentences.english: "[The Danish text] destroyed two years of effort in one fell swoop," De Boer wrote.
sentences.chinese: 一举摧毁了长达两年的努力，”在信中德波尔写道。

sentences.english: Leggat has more than 28 years of communications and leadership experience.
sentences.chinese: 雷戎先生拥有长达28年的公关从业和管理经验。

sentences.english: IT was 37 seconds long and came from outer space.
sentences.chinese: 这个信号长达37秒，而且是来自外层空间。

sentences.english: I use around 1, 000 men to secure a 60-km stretch of road.
sentences.chinese: 我要用1千人来控制那里长达60公里的公路路段。

sentences.english: The answering machine is able to store messages that are up to two minutes in length.
sentences.chinese: 录音电话能够录存长达两分钟的信息。

sentences.english: Over the course of four weeks, they spotted coelacanths only six times.
sentences.chinese: 在长达四周的活动中，他们仅有六次观察到腔棘鱼。

sentences.english: Loggerhead turtles can stay underwater for up to an hour.
sentences.chinese: 蠵龟在水下停留的时间长达1小时。

sentences.english: There are about a thousand fish of different species in the aquarium, which is approximately 50 metres long.
sentences.chinese: 长达50米的水族箱里养着上千种不同种类的鱼。

sentences.english: Six more thrombotic events took place during the year-long follow-up, three each in the two groups.
sentences.chinese: 六血栓事件发生在长达一年的随访，各有三个两组。

definition: time-consuming/to take a period of (x amount of time)
to span/to stretch across/to travel across
several weeks/also written 數週|数周
separated in time (usu. followed by a quantity of time)
